content: ending with row 1 or 5 of patt and ws facing for next row beg with a k row and working in st st throughout increase 1 st at next row knit to end and at same time decrease 1 st at each each end of 3rd and 0 4 8 0 4 4 foll - rs 4th - 4th 4th row end of row 63 71 73 75 79 81 sts then on every foll rs 4th 6th 4th 6th 6th row to beg with a k row and working in st st throughout cont until work 55 57 57 63 63 67 sts meas 11 12 14 15 17 18 cm ending with rs facing for next row cont without shaping until sleeve meas 10 12 15 17 19 21 cm shape armholes ending with rs facing for next row next row k2 sl1 k1 psso knit to last 4 sts k2tog k2 shape sleeve top next row p2 p2tog purl to last 4 sts p2togtbl p2 decrease 1 st as set at each end of next 5 row then on 59 67 69 71 75 77 sts 1 2 2 2 2 2 foll rs row 43 43 43 49 49 53 sts these 2 row set armhole shaping cast off 6 6 6 7 7 7 sts at beg of next 6 row 7 7 7 7 7 11 sts decrease 1 st as set at each end of next 3 row then on cast off rem 7 7 7 7 7 11 sts 1 2 2 2 2 2 foll rs row 51 57 59 61 65 67 sts ** cont without shaping until armhole meas making up 10 11 11 12 12 13 cm ending with rs facing for next row front neckband shape shoulders with rs facing using 2 75mm needles pick up and knit cast off 6 7 7 8 8 9 sts at beg of next 2 row 7 7 7 8 8 10 sts down left side of neck 17 19 21 21 21 21 sts from front neck and pick up and knit 7 7 8 8 10 sts up right cast off 7 8 8 8 9 9 sts at beg of next 2 row side of neck 31 33 35 37 37 41 sts 25 27 29 29 31 31 sts row 1 ws k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end cast off rem 25 27 29 29 31 31 sts row 2 * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 these 2 row set rib work 5 row as set cast off in rib back neckband right shoulder buttonhole band with rs facing using 2 75mm needles pick up and knit with rs facing using 2 75mm needles pick up and knit 25 27 29 29 31 31 sts 19 21 21 23 23 25 sts from shoulder and front neckband work 7 row in rib as set on front neckband work
